blog.author: Sunny Golovine
blog.intro: I write about whatever topics pique my interest, mostly tech but I will also venture into other topics. Views expressed are my own.

template.otherPostsDescription: Check out some of my other recent posts.
template.disclaimer: Views expressed in this post are strictly my own.

landingPage.bio: Hey! My name is Sunny and I'm a software engineer from Denver, CO. I specialize in building websites and mobile applications using Javascript and React. When I'm not coding you can find me out hiking or on a paddleboard.

professionalProjects.description: Professional projects that I have led or contributed to at work.

personalProjects.description: Personal projects that I have worked on outside of work.

landing.intro: I often will build tiny apps that do not warrant their own repository and hosting. For those apps I keep them here.

template.intro: This page serves as a template for all future apps build on the Apps Platform.
